<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl"><sys_security_acl action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><admin_overrides>true</admin_overrides><advanced>true</advanced><condition table="x_58872_needit_needit">u_requested_forDYNAMIC90d1921e5f510100a9ad2572f2b477fe^EQ<item endquery="false" field="u_requested_for" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="DYNAMIC" or="false" value="90d1921e5f510100a9ad2572f2b477fe"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></condition><description/><name>x_58872_needit_needit</name><operation display_value="create">create</operation><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
  //Check to see if the form is for a new record.  If it is a new record, 
  //set the Requested for value to the currently logged in user.

}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-10-20 14:48:59</sys_created_on><sys_id>1af5af94074020105734f6fd7c1ed0c1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_58872_needit_needit</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_1af5af94074020105734f6fd7c1ed0c1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-10-20 14:48:59</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>
